title: Auslan for families: vocabulary. Episodes 1-5
creator_contributor_role: VSDC Services for Deaf Children, production company

subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Sign language - Study and teaching

description: Brian Bemal presents 5 episodes of Auslan signing pertaining to general conversation: family, school, shopping, food and play, with each episode building on the next. The video is accompanied by a guidebook containing pages from the VSDC "Dictionary of Auslan" from which the numbered signs are taken. Approximately 900 signs are shown. Suitable for beginners.
